Any of the items on the list can be submitted towards your quota. The icon to the left of the item name indicates which Disciple of the Hand class will earn experience points for delivery.<tab><tab>

Unlike other society quests, you will not be allowed to reaccept a delivery quest in the event you abandon it, and must wait a day (Earth time) before being issued another allowance. Moreover, the list of currently sought items will be updated each day at <var 06 01 /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> (Earth time), and items previously sought may no longer be accepted.<tab><tab>

Outfitting your level 50 retainer with the proper gear will increase her chances of finding rare items while on exploration ventures. After assigning your retainer a quick exploration venture, keep an eye on your log window for a message telling you whether or not her current equipment is sufficient.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Transfiguration<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> is the term used to describe when a character has temporarily taken on a physical form drastically different from their normal one. The status can be removed at any time by selecting it.<tab><tab>
The status will also be removed upon logging out or leaving the current area.<tab><tab>

Your relic weapon novus can now be <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>soulglazed<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>! Speak with Jalzahn to have him apply the coating so that you may begin <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>attuning<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> soul energy to the item by wielding it in battle.<tab><tab>

Use a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Zodiac glass<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> while equipped with a relic weapon novus to determine the item's current level of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>soul attunement<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. If you happen to misplace your Zodiac glass, a new one can be obtained from <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Drake<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in Hyrstmill.<tab><tab>
Participating in certain duties will accelerate the rate with which soul attunement is achieved. Inquire with other adventurers as to which activities yield the best results.<tab><tab>

Once you believe soul attunement has been achieved, take your weapon back to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Jalzahn<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in Hyrstmill to complete the upgrading process.
Remember, soul energy can only attune to weapons which have been soulglazed. If you decide to enhance additional relic weapons, do not forget to first take them to Jalzahn. <tab><tab>

You have thinned the population of fish in this area enough to lure forth a rare species which normally remains hidden. There are several types of these timid wavekin in waters, sands, and skies across Eorzea.<tab><tab>
These rare fish, however, will not remain in the area for long, so once you have detected one, focus all your efforts on not letting him be the “one that got away.”<tab><tab>

You have caught an elusive fish that will only appear when one specific weather type follows another! There are several types of these fickle creatures in waters, sands, and skies across Eorzea, so keep an eye out for meteorological changes while casting your line.<tab><tab>

In addition to their deadly weaponskills, ninjas have at their disposal special battle techniques known as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>ninjutsu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which are readied by first making a series of ritual hand gestures known as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>mudra<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

Ninjutsu can be executed after combining one or more of the following three mudra in a predetermined order:
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Ten (Heaven)<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Chi (Earth)<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Jin (Man)<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> <tab><tab>
You will learn new mudra as you progress through the ninja storyline. Learning new mudra will open the door to more complex ninjutsu techniques.<tab><tab>

Once you have obtained a new ninjutsu technique, you can confirm the proper mudra order required to execute it by selecting its icon in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Actions & Traits<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface.<tab><tab>

The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Ceremony of Eternal Bonding<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> is a special rite of passage for two individuals wishing to pledge each other a lifetime of devotion. Only those who have proved their commitment through a long and perilous quest will be granted access to the Ivory Chapel where they will be united in the divine light of the Twelve.<tab><tab>

This quest can be accepted at the Sanctum of the Twelve from the ceremony planner <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Claribel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> upon meeting the following requirements:
You are currently in a party with your partner You both have equipped a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>promise wristlet<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> You both have completed the main scenario quest, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>The Scions of the Seventh Dawn<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab>

Preparations for the final ceremony─both physical and spiritual─will be made during the course of Claribel's quest. This includes the selection of ceremony attire and the creation of rings.
Once the first step has been taken, countless more await. Let them be a test of your devotion!<tab><tab>

Now that you have completed <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>The Ties that Bind<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you may speak with ceremony planning assistant <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Raitmeaux<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to determine the particulars of your big day. Both you and your partner will have the opportunity to request how the ceremony will be held, however, only the decisions made by one of you will be reflected, so make sure you both select the same options.<tab><tab>

Permission to use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Ivory Chapel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─the hallowed hall within the Sanctum of the Twelve used for Bonding Ceremonies─must be granted by Sanctum dedicant <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Etoinelle<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Reservations can be made at any time, with schedules for each week being posted at <var 07 FE545C8A10 /var><var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var>:00 <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> every Friday (Earth time). If in the event you are forced to cancel a reservation, you must wait until the next week to make a new one.<tab><tab>

Upon completing your chapel reservation, the dedicant will present you with a customizable invitation which you can send to guests.
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※Please note that due to server issues, there may be times unavailable for reservation.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab>

On the day of the ceremony, you must first speak with Etoinelle to gain admittance to the Sanctum. Once inside, you will be presented with an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>eternity bell<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> which is rung when you wish to proceed to the next stage of the ceremony.<tab><tab>

You have received an invitation to a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Ceremony of Eternal Bonding<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to be held at the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Sanctum of the Twelve<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Please take care not to discard or trade the item.<tab><tab>

The date and time of the ceremony are detailed in the invitation's help text. Speak with dedicant <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Etoinelle<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to gain admittance to the Sanctum.<tab><tab>

You now possess a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>fledgling chocobo registration form<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>! This document grants you sole ownership of a newly hatched chocobo bred specially to race.<tab><tab>

Until its maiden race, your fledgling will be trained and cared for by the chocobokeeps at <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Moogle's Gift Mounts<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in Bentbranch Meadows. If you happen to lose your registration form, ownership is rescinded, so store the document in a safe location.<tab><tab>

After officially registering your fledgling as a race chocobo, it will be moved from Bentbranch Meadows to the stables at the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Manderville Gold Saucer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. All further training will be conducted here.
Remember, adventurers may only own a single race chocobo. If you would like another, you must first retire the one you currently possess.<tab><tab>

Your race chocobo has learned an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>ability<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
There are two types of race abilities. The first are active abilities which are automatically set to the race hotbar, allowing you the freedom to choose the timing of their execution. The second type includes latent traits─such as resistance against certain enfeeblements─which remain active for the duration of a race.<tab><tab>

Some abilities are passed down from a chocobo's parents. These are called <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>hereditary<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Others are learned. These are called <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>acquired<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

While hereditary abilities cannot be forgotten, acquired ones can by using a bottle of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>lethe water<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
If you have the means to afford them, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>training manuals<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be purchased to teach your race chocobo the ability of your choice.<tab><tab>

Your race chocobo has achieved rank 40!
Rank 40 chocobos can be retired without handing over complete ownership to the Manderville Gold Saucer. Once retired, a chocobo can be bred, resulting in a new chocobo for you to train and race. This process is called <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>covering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

The type of fledgling chocobo that is born as a result of covering is based solely on the pedigree and pedigree level of its parents. Pedigree level is determined by the strength of a chocobo's individual attributes such as acceleration and cunning.<tab><tab>

While the pedigree of both parents plays a role in determining the pedigree level of a newborn fledgling, the blood of the lower-leveled parent will often have more influence on the resulting offspring.<tab><tab>

Finally, if you do not have both a male and female chocobo retired, you can hire a breeding chocobo for the covering process. Stock with higher pedigree levels will, of course, require more MGP to use.<tab><tab>

Before you can create a deck with your new Triple Triad cards, you must first <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>claim<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> them. Open up your inventory and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Use<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> a card to claim it. Once you have claimed enough cards to make a deck (at least five), select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gold Saucer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>main menu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. From there, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Card Decks<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to begin building your masterpiece.<tab><tab>

Once you've built a deck, all that's left is to find an opponent and challenge them to a match.
If you have any questions on how to play Triple Triad, be sure to ask the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Triple Triad master<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for a private lesson.<tab><tab>

You have now entered the world of Triple Triad match play. If you see someone with a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>card icon<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> next to their name, it means they are currently seeking a match.<tab><tab>

Triple Triad matches are not only limited to the confines of the Manderville Gold Saucer. You can seek a match with other PCs anywhere in Eorzea.
Good luck and may the Spinner's pull be ever kind!<tab><tab>
Welcome to the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Manderville Gold Saucer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, where all your dreams can come true!<tab><tab>

That is, all your dreams can come true <var 1A 02 /var>if<var 1A 01 /var> you have enough Manderville Gold Saucer points (<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>MGP<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>). Gil can be exchanged for MGP at the main counter in the middle of Entrance Square. The current rate is 10 gil for one MGP. Ul'dahn law prevents the Gold Saucer from exchanging MGP if the patron already possesses more than 500.<tab><tab>

MGP cannot be converted back into gil, but the points can be used to purchase an assortment of wonderful prizes from the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>prize claim<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> attendant, also located at the main counter in Entrance Square.<tab><tab>

Your race chocobo has gone up in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rank<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
The types of races your chocobo can participate in are determined by its <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rating<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. The higher the rating, the more prestigious the races made available to you and your steed will become.<tab><tab>
Your chocobo's rating is determined by several factors, including its rank and pedigree. <tab><tab>
To ensure chocobos are evenly matched, lower class races will become unavailable once a steed achieves a certain rating.<tab><tab>

You have received a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Soul of the Crafter<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>! Trading it for a specialized soul will allow you to become a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>specialist<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in that particular discipline.<tab><tab>

Specialists will be able to access unique actions that allow for more efficient and higher-quality synthesis in their specialized fields. You may select up to three different disciplines in which to specialize.
Adding, removing, or changing a specialty can be done at any time, but please note that new Souls of the Crafter may be difficult to acquire.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>※Specialties cannot be changed more than three times a week (Earth time).<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab>

Some NPCs will seek to barter with you for your collectables, but will require that the items are of a certain collectability. Confirm these numbers before gathering or crafting a collectable, lest you procure an item no one wants.<tab><tab>

You have gained the ability to take flight! Summon forth a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>flying mount<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and try <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>jumping<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to take off.<tab><tab>

Flying consists of three basic maneuvers:
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Advancing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Movement keys <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Ascending<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Jump key <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Descending<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Draw/sheathe weapon key<tab><tab>

Flying consists of three basic maneuvers:
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Advancing<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Stick <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Ascending<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> <var 1E 0C /var> button <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Descending<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> <var 1E 0D /var>+<var 1E 0E /var> button<tab><tab>

Your expansive knowledge and experience has qualified you to assume the role of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>mentor<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>! As a mentor, your primary task will be to provide guidance and assistance to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>new adventurers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> as well as any other troubled heroes who might be in need of your accumulated wisdom.<tab><tab>

Upon receiving certification from the Smith, the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>mentor<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> setting will become available as one of your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>online status<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> options.
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※Setting this status will allow other adventurers to identify you as a mentor.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab>

Three additional settings are also available to specify your field of expertise: <var 12 50 /var> PvE Mentor, <var 12 52 /var> PvP Mentor, and <var 12 51 /var> Trade Mentor.
Should you qualify as both a battle and trade mentor, you will also be able to choose to status <var 12 4F /var> Mentor, which marks you as an expert in all fields.<tab><tab>

While you retain the position of mentor, you will be able to invite new adventurers to the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Novice Network<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─an exclusive chat channel where beginners can seek the advice of veteran players. Battle mentors also gain access to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty Roulette: Mentor<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which offers special rewards, so don't be shy about aiding your fellow adventurers!<tab><tab>

In addition to regular gathering points, there also exist nodes known as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>ephemeral gathering points<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Even though these points may appear in your gathering log, depending on the time of day, they may remain hidden in the field.<tab><tab>

While the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Whisperer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> traits (<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Stone Whisperer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for miners, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Tree Whisperer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for botanists) grant you the ability to recognize a gathering node's hidden characteristics, there are some characteristics that require the acquisition of further traits to uncover.<tab><tab>
Even then, the characteristics will not always be visible, so when they are, do not miss out on the chance to exploit them!<tab><tab>

The item you just obtained is a perfect candidate for <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>aetherial reduction<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>! Reducing an item breaks it down into its base aetherial components, or simply put, renders it into another item. Once an item is reduced, it is lost forever; however, depending on the original item's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectability<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, the number of resulting items may increase.<tab><tab>

Among unspoiled gathering points, there are legendary sites that can be discovered by acquiring <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>tomes of regional folklore<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Each volume contains the tales and traditions of a particular region, and using the item adds this information to your gathering log under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Special<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

Volumes you have yet to obtain can be reviewed in your gathering log. There are many valuable resources out there waiting to be found, and it begins by collecting tomes of regional folklore!<tab><tab>

Whenever you open a treasure coffer, a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>loot list<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will appear. If someone in your party opens a coffer, you will first receive a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>notice<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the bottom right-hand corner of your screen. Clicking on this notice will bring up the loot list.<tab><tab>

For each item in the chest, you will have the opportunity to select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Need<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Greed<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, or <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Pass<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
Need: You really need the item. Greed: You want the item, but do not need it. Pass: You do not need the item.
Once everyone in your party has made their selections, the loot will be distributed automatically.<tab><tab>

Players may change their selection to Pass after selecting Need or Greed, but once Pass has been selected, the decision is deemed final. If all party members choose Pass, then the item will be discarded.<tab><tab>
Gil and quest-related items will be divided evenly amongst all party members.<tab><tab>

Whenever you open a treasure coffer, a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>loot list<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> will appear. If someone in your party opens a coffer, you will first receive a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>notice<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the bottom right-hand corner of your screen. Targeting and selecting this notice will bring up the loot list.<tab><tab>

When participating in an instanced duty with a preformed or an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>unrestricted<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> party, the party leader can opt to employ either the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Lootmaster<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> or <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Greed Only<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> loot rules.<tab><tab>

The current loot rule can be changed at any time within the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty Finder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> settings, but only before a duty has commenced. The party leader should discuss any changes to the rule to avoid confusion amongst party members.<tab><tab>

In Ishgard, levequests are not issued by the Adventurers' Guild, but by the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Temple Knights<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. The system, however, remains much the same, the one difference being that in addition to normal levequests which require one leve allowance to accept, there are also <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>large-scale levequests<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> which require ten. These quests will require more effort, but yield richer rewards.<tab><tab>

Treasure coffers discovered on the battlefield during battlecraft levequests will sometimes contain <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>amber-encased vilekin<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. These rare items can be exchanged with <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>amber traders<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for items unobtainable anywhere else.<tab><tab>

You have obtained a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectable<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>! The higher an item's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectability<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, the more attractive it is to certain NPCs who are seeking to purchase or trade for them.<tab><tab>
Collectables cannot be stacked or sold to regular merchants, nor can they be consumed or used as material for synthesis.<tab><tab>

Furthermore, there exist certain wares that can only be crafted as collectables. This can be confirmed both in its description and in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>crafting log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

Using the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collectable Synthesis<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> command will grant you the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collectable Synthesis<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status. While under the effect of this status, you will have the option to “finish” certain items as collectables after the final step of successful synthesis.<tab><tab>

Increasing an item's quality through synthesis will also increase its <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectability<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. If, by the final step, the collectability achieved is not at a level deemed acceptable by the NPC seeking the item, it is best to complete the synthesis normally so that the item might be sold or used.<tab><tab>

You have learned<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var> Collect<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─a special Disciple of the Land action that is used to gather an item as a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectable<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

While fishing under the effect of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collector's Glove<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, fish landed will be gathered as collectables, their size directly affecting <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectability<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

While under the effect of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Collector's Glove<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> status, you will be given the option to gather items as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

Items are now suitable for gathering as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Before gathering the item, use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Appraisal<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> actions to increase its <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rarity<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, and in turn, its <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectability<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

While appraisal increases rarity, it also increases an item's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>wear<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. If wear increases beyond an item's limit, gathering rate will drop significantly.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Lord of Verminion<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> is a Gold Saucer-exclusive attraction in which you pit your personal minions against the minions of others in a game of skill and strategy. There are several different modes of play, from single-player challenges to realm-wide tournaments.<tab><tab>

Gameplay is done through a special interface centered on your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>minion hotbar<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. The minion hotbar can be edited by selecting <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Verminion<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> located under the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gold Saucer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> option in your main menu.
※Minions not set to your minion hotbar can still be summoned during matches.<tab><tab>

When challenging other players in head-to-head battles, you will earn or lose <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rank points (RP)<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> depending on the outcome of the match. Your current RP total can be viewed under the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gold Saucer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> option in your main menu. RP is used to determine your ranking in the realm as well as determine opponents when entering general matches.
※There are some match types in which RP are not affected by match outcome.<tab><tab>

There are three types of matches available in Lord of Verminion─the Verminion Challenge, player battles, and tournaments.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Verminion Challenge<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> A series of themed battles designed to teach the game's rules. Your opponent will be an NPC known as a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Minion master<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Player Battles<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Matches played against other players. Depending on the battle type, RP totals may or may not be affected by match outcomes.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Tournaments<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Tournaments consist of multiple matches against other players, with victories earning you <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>tournament points<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. At the end of a tournament, the players with the most tournament points will be rewarded with prizes.
※Tournaments will often feature special rules and restrictions.<tab><tab>

Minions are categorized into four unique types─monster, critter, poppet, and gadget. The first three exhibit strengths and weaknesses against the others, with only gadgets being neither strong nor weak against any. This relationship in Lord of Verminion is called dominance.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Monsters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> are effective against <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>critters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> while ineffective against <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>poppets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Critters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> are effective against <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>poppets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> while ineffective against <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>monsters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Poppets<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> are effective against <var 48 F201F8 /var><var 49 F201F9 /var>monsters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> while ineffective against <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>critters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
Gadgets are not affected by dominance.<tab><tab>

Some minions may also have strengths against playing field objects known as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>structures<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. A minion's strengths can be viewed by selecting the minion in your <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>minion hotbar<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> or <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>minion list<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

In addition to Arcana Stones, there are several other types of structures that can be found on the playing field.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Shield<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Shields protect Arcana Stones by reducing the amount of damage dealt to them by opponent minions. Destroying a shield increases Arcana Stone vulnerability.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Search Eye<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Search Eyes reveal the location of all enemy minions on the playing field. Damaging an opponent's Search Eye prevents them from seeing your minions until they are within proximity of one of their minions.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Gates<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Gates serve as minion summoning points, as well as teleportation devices, and sanctuaries in which minion HP is restored. None of these features are available if the gate is damaged.<tab><tab>
Minions also cannot be harmed while within the boundaries of one of their side's gates.<tab><tab>

Damaged or destroyed structures will automatically repair themselves over time. Gathering ally minions near a damaged structure accelerates the repairing process.
※Arcana Stones cannot be repaired.<tab><tab>

Certain quests employ an automatic level adjustment system known as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>quest sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, which adjusts the difficulty and EXP rewards to your current level. <tab><tab>

Please note that when accepting certain quests, a message will appear indicating that you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted the quest. In this case, changing your class or job will prevent completion of the quest's objectives.<tab><tab>

Some quests will be marked with a <var 48 F201F6 /var><var 49 F201F7 /var><var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> icon. This indicates that you must play the quest using the same class or job with which you accepted it, and that changing classes or jobs at any time will prevent quest progress.<tab><tab>

The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>orchestrion<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be used to change the music in your estate or inn room, but only if you have first obtained song <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>rolls<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

Rolls can be obtained through a variety of means including synthesis, purchase in shops, and discovery in treasure coffers. After obtaining a roll, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>use<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> it to add the track to your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>orchestrion list<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

Accessing an orchestrion will open the settings interface. From here you can listen to any tracks you have registered, as well as select that track to play in your estate or apartment. Shared estate background music can only be changed if you have been granted the proper authorization.<tab><tab>
A feature unique to orchestrions in estates and apartments is the ability to register tracks to a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>playlist<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>

Up to eight songs can be registered to a playlist, which can then be played in order, shuffled, or a single track can be selected to play on repeat. Playback options for the playlist can be accessed via subcommands or the buttons found at the bottom of the playlist interface. Tracks not listed in the playlist can also be set as estate background music by using the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Select Track<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> option at the bottom of the interface.<tab><tab>

It is possible to grow a number of decorative plants for your estate using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>flowerpots<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. The use of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>pomace<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> when tending to these potted plants can affect their color when they bloom. Fully grown plants can then be plucked and placed in a flower vase to decorate your estate.<tab><tab>

After successfully locating and opening a treasure chest, there is a chance it will summon a teleportation portal. If you should find one, it can be used to transport yourself and any nearby party members to a treasure dungeon.<tab><tab>

These vaults are comprised of several chambers. Each chamber contains a treasure coffer, the contents of which are increasingly more rare as you progress. To reach subsequent chambers, however, you must defeat several enemies to receive a key that will open one of the doors.<tab><tab>

Choose your door carefully, as one will activate a trap which immediately expels trespassers from the vault. Pass all of the traps and fight your way to the final chamber to reap rich rewards!<tab><tab>

Aquariums can be used to put on display the various fish you catch on your travels.
They are available in four <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>tiers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> (sizes), each tier able to hold a predetermined number of fish.<tab><tab>

Before placing any fish in an aquarium, you may choose to fill the tank with either <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>fresh water<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> or <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>saltwater<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. This will dictate which types of fish can be placed in the aquarium. You may also select trimmings with which to decorate the inside of the tank.<tab><tab>

Fish have been categorized into four sizes─<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>small<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> (one unit), <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>medium<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> (two units), <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>large<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> (four units), and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>extra large<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> (seven units). It is worth noting that larger fish will occupy more space in an aquarium, leaving less room for other fish.<tab><tab>

Aquariums are available in four tiers, the smallest holding only a single unit, and the largest holding up to seven. Because larger fish take up more room in the aquarium, one must choose carefully which fish they will put on display.<tab><tab>

Glamours are now available for your summoner and scholar familiars. Applying them is as simple as typing in the following text command:
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>/petglamour “summon name” “glamour” <var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab>

For example, if you wish to change the appearance of your Titan-Egi to Ruby Carbuncle, you need only enter
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>/petglamour “titan-egi” “ruby carbuncle”<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
and then cast Summon Titan.<tab><tab>

Finally, there are two rules you must remember when using egi glamours.
1. The text command must be executed before summoning your familiar as glamours will not be applied if it has already been summoned. 2. Entering the text command without specifying a glamour will return your familiar to its original form.
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※Check the Lodestone for information on currently available glamours.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab>

Leveling your character is crucial to unlocking Eorzea's end content; however, it is not the only value you need to keep your eye on. Almost as important as the level of your class/job is the level of your gear. The reason behind this is simple: all gear is not created equal, with items featuring a high <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>IL (item level)<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> most often stronger than those with a low IL.<tab><tab>

While some high-level weapons and gear can be crafted or purchased in stores, the majority can be obtained in exchange for <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Allagan tomestones<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─special drops that can be found in instanced dungeons, raids, and on the Hunt.<tab><tab>

Once you have collected enough tomestones, journey to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Revenant's Toll<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to outfit yourself with the best equipment the realm has to offer!<tab><tab>
Each piece of gear in Eorzea is assigned a level to indicate its relative strength.<tab><tab>

The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>average IL<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> of your currently equipped gear (including your accessories) is an important value that can determine not only whether or not you will have trouble in certain battles, but oftentimes whether or not you will even be allowed to participate.
Your current average IL can be viewed at any time under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> within the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>main menu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>
You will soon find that maintaining a high average item level is the key to success in tackling Eorzea's myriad challenges.<tab><tab>
You (and all your flying mounts) have received the Kojin tribe's ancient blessing, and can now breathe underwater indefinitely!<tab><tab>

To dive, you must first be swimming in a body of water that allows diving. Next, you simply need to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>descend<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> as you would with any flying mount (default: Ctrl+Space).
If you are riding a flying mount, you can go from flying to diving by descending into the water at the proper angle.<tab><tab>

To dive, you must first be swimming in a body of water that allows diving. Next, you simply need to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>descend<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> as you would with any flying mount by pressing <var 1E 0A /var>.
If you are riding a flying mount, you can go from flying to diving by descending into the water at the proper angle.<tab><tab>

There are special emotes such as <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>/waterflip<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> that can only be used while underwater. These emotes are indicated by a unique icon.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty Actions<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> are special actions that are available only during the course of specific quests or battles. Duty actions are used by left-clicking their icon, but can be bound to other keys.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty actions<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> are special actions that are available only during the course of specific quests or battles. Duty actions are used by pressing <var 1E 12 /var> while holding down both <var 1E 0F /var> and <var 1E 10 /var>.<tab><tab>
Some duty actions can only be used a limited number of times. Deciding when or when not to use them can mean the difference between victory and a quick trip back to your Home Point.<tab><tab>

You have been granted access to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Astragalos<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, an old Sharlayan testing site situated in the Dravanian hinterlands!
Here, you may take part in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Rival Wings<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, a large-scale war game incorporating powerful goblin-made machina. Adventurers are divided into two teams, the Falcons and the Ravens, with each side setting out to destroy the core located in the opponent's base. If you are interested in learning more, speak with Softknox at the Wolves' Den Pier.<tab><tab>

You are now able to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>spearfish<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>! However, to access this new feature, you must first equip a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gig<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in your off hand. If you do not already have one, gigs can be purchased from fieldcraft vendors or other shops that sell bait and tackle.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Teeming waters<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> are home to many different kinds of elusive creatures. It is at these locations that you can use your gig to land catches that normally ignore a fisher's line.<tab><tab>

The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Shark Eye<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be used to identify the location of nearby teeming waters and display them on your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>minimap<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>
Target the teeming waters and press <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>confirm<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to begin spearfishing.<tab><tab>

When bubbles appear within the teeming waters, it means a fish has approached. Use the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gig<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> command at this time to spear the creature and add it to your inventory.<tab><tab>

There are several types of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gig heads<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> each specialized for catching different kinds of fish. If it looks like you are not having luck with your current head, change it! All gigs come complete with a set of interchangeable heads.<tab><tab>

You have learned a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>role action<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
Role actions are spells and weaponskills that are assigned to all the classes within a role (Tank, Melee DPS, Ranged DPS, Healer) rather than a specific class. Role actions are learned in the same manner as class actions─via leveling─but only need to be learned once to be able to use them with all participating classes within a role.<tab><tab>

The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Role<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> section has been added to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Actions & Traits<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, found under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>main menu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Selecting it will display the role actions you have learned.<tab><tab>

Use your harp to create sweet, sweet music by selecting a sound from <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Performance<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Actions & Traits<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu. Then, simply use the keyboard to create your masterpiece! Remember, performance actions can only be used while your job is set to bard.<tab><tab>

The realm's problems can wait until tomorrow, for today we dress like heroes and heroines in Masked Rose's <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Fashion Report<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> fashion challenges! New challenges are posted in the Gold Saucer every week (Earth time) on <var 06 1203 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var> and are live for three days until <var 06 1206 /var><var 09 DD ((Sunday)) ((Monday)) ((Tuesday)) ((Wednesday)) ((Thursday)) ((Friday)) ((Saturday)) /var> at <var 08 DB ((<var 09 DB02030405060708090A0B0C0D02030405060708090A0B0C /var>)) 0D /var> <var 08 E0DB0D ((p.m.)) ((a.m.)) /var>.<tab><tab>

Each challenge begins with themes given for 11 different equipment slots (not including off hand). Adventurers then choose from their wardrobes pieces of gear that they feel will complement those themes.<tab><tab>

Masked Rose will judge adventurers' attire and award a score from 1 to 100 based on their coordination skills. Adventurers are given four opportunities per challenge to have their attire judged. It is recommended that adventurers share insight with each other on how they fared to determine what combinations of gear earn the highest scores.<tab><tab>
MGP can be earned once per week for partaking in a Fashion Report, with bonus MGP being awarded to those who achieve a rating of 80 or above.<tab><tab>

Is your inventory cluttered with gear you only wear on special occasions? Are glamour prisms causing you headaches? <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Glamour dressers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> have been added to inn rooms across the realm to make applying and managing glamoured gear simpler and more intuitive.<tab><tab>

Start by adding gear to any glamour dresser where it is instantly transformed into a glamour. Next, use <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>glamour plates<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to create full sets of glamoured attire which can be applied to your character all at once.<tab><tab>

If you come across a piece of gear whose design tickles your fancy, you may be able to store it in a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>glamour dresser<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> where it will be instantly transformed into a glamour. This can be confirmed via the item's help window. Once stored in the glamour dresser, images of the gear can be applied to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>glamour plates<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and then equipped via the plates at your leisure. Note, however, that gear stored in a glamour dresser can not be equipped until removed from the glamour dresser.<tab><tab>

Images of gear stored in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>glamour dressers<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> or your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>armoire<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can be applied to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>glamour plates<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to create full sets of glamoured attire that can be equipped with a single command.<tab><tab>

Glamour plates allow players to instantly equip an entire set of glamoured gear without expending glamour prisms. <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※Please note that glamour plates can only be used while in a large city or sanctuary.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab>

You have obtained your very own <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>magia board<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>! In Eureka, each creature is aspected to a certain element, giving them a distinct advantage in battle. You will need to make judicious use of both the magia board and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>magicite<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to overcome your foes.<tab><tab>

Raise your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>affinity<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> to certain elements by melding magicite to your magia board or spinning the board to change its alignment. A magia board properly configured to an enemy's aetherial tilt can enhance both offensive and defensive capabilities.
Speak to the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Expedition Engineer<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for further guidance.<tab><tab>

A <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>saddlebag<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for your chocobo is now available. This spacious sack can be used as a supplement to your normal storage, with features allowing for the simple transfer of items between the saddlebag and your personal and retainer inventories.<tab><tab>

Your chocobo companion does not need to be summoned to access the saddlebag, however, it cannot be opened while in an <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>instanced dungeon<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, so be sure to move items required on raids to your normal inventory before commencing the duty.<tab><tab>

The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty Recorder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> is now unlocked, allowing you to document duties for viewing at a later date. Playback features include speed adjustment, focus target switching, and more.<tab><tab>

Duty recording is only allowed after several conditions have been met─the first being that the recorder is enabled. Recording can be enabled from the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty Recorder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> interface located under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.<tab><tab>

The following conditions must be met to use the Duty Recorder:
1. Recorder is enabled. 2. Current duty is available for recording. 3. Parties meet minimum size requirements. 4. Record ready check has been executed.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>1. Recorder settings are enabled<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Recorder settings can be adjusted under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty Recorder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, found under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu. When disabled, a recording of the duty will not be taken, even if all other conditions for recording are met.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>2. Current duty is available for recording<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Not all duties are available for recording. Recordable duties are marked with a special icon. This list will change with updates.
<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>3. Parties meet minimum size requirements<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Duties undertaken by undersized parties cannot be recorded. This includes parties formed via the Duty Finder.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>4. Record ready check has been executed<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
Approval from all party members is required before recording can begin. Record ready checks are executed under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Party<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu and must be performed within <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>5 minutes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> of commencing a duty.<tab><tab>

4. Record ready check has been executed
Approval from all party members is required before recording can begin. Record ready checks are executed under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Party<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu and must be performed within <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>5 minutes<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> of commencing a duty.<tab><tab>

Recorded duties can be viewed in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>inns<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> across the realm. The various playback controls, including <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Group Pose<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Idling Camera<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> functionality, can be confirmed in the Duty Recorder help text.<tab><tab>

The <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>message book<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> allows anyone visiting an apartment or estate to leave messages for the home's owner. Conversely, a greeting can be written on the book's first page for all visitors to see.<tab><tab>

Consider your message carefully when writing in a message book, as you may only add one entry per day. If necessary, the message can also be removed either by the person who originally penned the entry or the message book's owner.<tab><tab>
Entries left in the message book are set to public by default, allowing anyone to view them. However, they can be set to private at the owner's discretion.<tab><tab>

Before leaving an estate, you can show your love of the house and its décor by leaving a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>like<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the message book. You are allowed ten likes upon first viewing a message book, and accumulate an additional five likes per day up to a maximum of fifty.<tab><tab>
Your companion has placed a great deal of trust in you. So much so, they are willing to allow you to change their attire using glamours.<tab><tab>

Gear for the head, body, hands, legs, and feet can be used for glamours so long as it can be equipped by all races and all classes. Please note, however, a glamour prism is required for each piece of gear you wish to glamour.<tab><tab>

As a reward for saving them from imminent peril, happy bunnies will help you find hidden treasure on the island.
They will give you hints as to the location of buried coffers each time you feed them a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>lucky carrot<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>
You can offer them as many carrots as you like, but move quickly. Happy bunnies will only accompany you for a limited time for fear of natural predators in the wilds.<tab><tab>

When traveling through the portal which can appear after a successful treasure hunt, you may find yourself in a Shifting Sanctum.
Here you will find an <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>arcane sphere<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> which must be used in an unpredictable summoning ritual.
Slay the enemy that appears after performing the rite and a treasure coffer will appear.<tab><tab>

The invocation rite can be performed up to five times, triggering one of several arcane runes in a circle around the room.
This rite typically results in a <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>lesser summon<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>greater summon<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, or an <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>elder summon<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
The more powerful the summoning, the greater the rewards.<tab><tab>
Should you mistakenly call forth <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Atomos<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, however, you will be forcibly expelled from the altar.<tab><tab>
The invocation rite may produce other, unexpected, results, but the only way to be certain is to reach the altars and discover its secrets for yourself.<tab><tab>

<var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>Mannequins<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> are a unique type of furnishing that can be used to not only display gear, but also sell it.
When placed in an apartment or estate, you will be asked to assign a retainer to manage any gear used for display or to be sold. It is worth noting that no taxes will be collected on gear sold from mannequins.<tab><tab>

Gear displayed on a mannequin can be sold separately or as a set. When sold as a set, it must be purchased directly from the mannequin.
It is still possible, however, to view sets of gear on the market board using advanced search options. You can then send a message directly to the seller.<tab><tab>

Gear sold via mannequins will also be marked with one of two unique icons when viewed on the market board to indicate they are sold separately or as a set.
Use your mannequin's ensembles to draw the eyes of fashion-forward adventurers and customers alike.<tab><tab>

You have gained access to the logos manipulator.
This device utilizes mnemes housed within logograms to grant players logos actions.<tab><tab>

Up to three logos actions can be held at any time.
When enabled, they will be registered as duty actions to be used while adventuring in Eureka.<tab><tab>

The logos manipulator can produce a wide variety of actions depending on the type and quantity of logograms used.
Only with trial and error, and perhaps a little luck, can you discover them all.<tab><tab>

The functionality of the logos manipulator has been expanded.
The device now houses both an astral and umbral array, each of which can hold up to three logograms. Please note, however, that using a total of four or more logograms will lower the chance of a successful transubstantiation.<tab><tab>

While not without risk, successful use of both arrays allows the creation of two actions to be used together during your adventures.
Discover the full potential of mnemes and overcome the dangers of Eureka.<tab><tab>

You have obtained a mount that accommodates additional passengers! After forming a party, the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Ride Pillion<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> option will be available when party members select you.
Saddle up and roll out with your friends!<tab><tab>

Rather than gaining new actions by increasing in level, blue mages <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>learn them from enemies<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. To acquire an ability, you must witness your foe perform a specific attack before defeating it.<tab><tab>

The actions you learn are recorded in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Blue Magic Spellbook<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, found under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>main menu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Spells must be registered as active actions and set to a hotbar before they can be used.<tab><tab>
You may register up to 24 spells at once. Checking the box next to a spell will add it to the list of active actions. From there, they can be set to a hotbar.<tab><tab>

The blue magic spellbook details the attack type and aspect of each action. You can also view hints on where to acquire spells that you have yet to discover.
In addition, if you use the Duty Finder to enter duties with level sync or item level sync enabled, the chance of acquiring spells from the corresponding enemies is significantly increased.<tab><tab>

By accessing certain aetherytes, it is possible to leave your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Home World<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and visit other World servers in your data center to party with friends, purchase items, and tackle duties.<tab><tab>

Be advised that certain restrictions apply when playing on servers other than your Home World.
You can view a list of these restrictions when accessing an aetheryte that allows World Visits.<tab><tab>

Unlike most other weapons, blue mage arms generally have little effect on a character's attributes. However, the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Intelligence<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> gained from armor and accessories provides a much larger increase in offensive magic damage compared to other jobs.<tab><tab>

The actions you learn are recorded in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Blue Magic Spellbook<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, found under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>main menu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. All actions must be registered before they can be used.<tab><tab>

FATEs in certain areas offer <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>bicolor gems<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> as rewards. They can be exchanged with gemstone traders for rare items, some of which can only be obtained via these vendors.<tab><tab>
Completing FATEs in these areas with the highest rating possible will increase your rank, which allows the local gemstone trader to offer a wider selection of items. <tab><tab>

To view your progress in each applicable area, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Shared FATE<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Travel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.<tab><tab>

To view your progress in each applicable area, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Shared FATE<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Travel<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the main menu.<tab><tab>

Expert recipes demand not only the use of formidable tools, but careful planning and execution of actions.
Unlike most crafted items, those made from expert recipes cannot have a poor or excellent condition. They will instead trigger heretofore unseen conditions with varying effects.
One must make effective use of these new crafting states to produce items of the highest quality.<tab><tab>

When fishing for the choicest of fish, <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> can significantly increase the quality of your next catch. However, your chances of reeling in said catch are diminished.<tab><tab>

While under the effect of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Patience<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, there are two actions you can use to negate your reduced chance of catching fish─<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Powerful Hookset<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Precision Hookset<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
These actions are best suited to different types of fish, so you will need to watch your line carefully to determine which to use.<tab><tab>

You've gained access to a fashion accessory. To use it, first select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Fashion Accessories<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>main menu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
The actions to equip accessories can be used directly from this menu, or registered to your hotbar.<tab><tab>

After equipping fashion accessories, they can be removed by pressing the action again, or by selecting “Put Away” from the hotbar. (Though who would want to stop flaunting such stylish accoutrements?)
<var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>※Fashion accessories may be equipped and removed as many times as you wish.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var><tab><tab>

You can now craft items using <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trial Synthesis<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. Trial synthesis allows you to practice crafting items without using materials, an ideal method for testing high-level recipes.<tab><tab>

To begin trial synthesis, open your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>crafting log<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, select the desired recipe, and then press the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trial Synthesis<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> button to the left of the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Quick Synthesis<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> button. It should be noted that, because you are conducting a trial, no items will be used when crafting. Furthermore, even if your trial synthesis proves successful, you will not receive an item nor will you earn experience points.<tab><tab>

You have begun gathering a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>collectable<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─a special type of item highly sought after by certain NPCs. Select the question mark icon at the bottom of the Collectables window to learn more.<tab><tab>

When gathering, there is a chance of triggering the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Gatherer's Boon<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> effect, which will grant an additional item during that gathering attempt.
The higher your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> rating, the better chance you have of triggering this effect.<tab><tab>

There are certain items that can only be gathered after attaining a sufficient <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>perception<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> rating.
The requirements for gathering such elusive items can be confirmed at any time via the gathering log.<tab><tab>

Your objective when spearfishing is to strike fish with a gig as they pass through teeming waters.
As they swim across your field of vision, you must strike them in their weak spot, its size increasing according to your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gathering<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> rating.<tab><tab>

Nearby fish will take notice of your actions in the teeming waters, their <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>wariness<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> represented by a gauge at the top of the spearfishing interface.
It increases slowly over time, as well as with each strike with your spear. When the gauge is full, the fish will disperse, ending your spearfishing attempt.<tab><tab>

Successfully catching fish in quick succession will increase your <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>catch<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> counter, which slows the rate at which wariness increases.<tab><tab>

Thinning the population of certain fish will eventually lure forth rare species, and also grant you the effect of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Spearfisher's Intuition<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>
These rare fish, however, will not remain in the area for long, so once you have detected one, focus all your efforts on not letting him be the “one that got away.”<tab><tab>

There are certain recipe items that can only be crafted after reaching a sufficient level of <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>quality<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> during synthesis.
The requirements for crafting such items can be confirmed at any time via the crafting log.<tab><tab>

When gathering collectables, you may come across <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>prime collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>─items whose composition is in flux.
Prime collectable items that have reached maximum collectability will, on occasion, yield exceedingly rare items from aetherial reduction.<tab><tab>

Moreover, these prime collectables may also become <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>sublime collectables<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> when they are gathered with maximum collectability, which guarantees a yield of rare items from aetherial reduction.<tab><tab>
A higher gathering rate increases your chances of a prime collectable becoming sublime.<tab><tab>

You have learned a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>gatherer role action<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
Gatherer role actions are abilities shared by botanists, miners, and fishers rather than a specific class. They are learned via leveling or upon completing certain quests, but only need to be learned once to be able to use them with all gathering classes.<tab><tab>
Once learned, these role actions can be used to reveal and track gathering locations in any given area, even for classes other than your currently selected one.<tab><tab>

Gatherer role actions can be found in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Actions & Traits<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> window, found under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Character<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> in the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>main menu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.<tab><tab>
Please note that glamours for summoner require completion of the quest “An Egi by Any Other Name,” while glamours for scholar require completion of the quest “A Faerie Tale Come True.”<tab><tab>

You have unlocked <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Facewear<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
These purely decorative accessories can be worn in addition to headgear.<tab><tab>

Review your collection by selecting Character from the main menu followed by <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Facewear<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>. From this window, you can choose different styles and colors and devise the perfect look for your character.<tab><tab>

The <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>scenario guide<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> is a HUD element that indicates the next available quest in the main scenario. It also displays the next available quest for your currently equipped job or class.<tab><tab>
By selecting the <var 48 F201FA /var><var 49 F201FB /var>scenario guide<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, you can confirm where these quests are located on the map.<tab><tab>
